text: 3.6 Mat 23.14, Tat 1.11 Bɨ anɨb okok, bin gos nɨgtep ma gɨpal ogɨnap kɨlop pɨyow nepal. Pɨyow nɨŋɨd, gos tɨmud kɨlop ak lɨpɨg dad amel kɨlop kɨdek gɨpal. Bin anɨb okok, tap si tap tɨmel gɨl, gos awl yɨbɨl nɨgɨlɨg mɨdebal. Chɨbol nab kɨli ayaŋ tɨkjakek, tap nɨgep ma nɨgep gɨpal anɨb okok jɨj ne ma mɨdeb. Takaw okok nɨb okok nɨb nɨgɨnɨgun agɨl gos nepal ak pen, takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl dɨnɨgel tek ma lup. Anɨb ak bɨ tɨmel anɨb okok, kɨli bin okok gos tɨmud kɨlop ak lɨpɨg dad amel kɨlop kɨdek gɨpal.
